message: Let's be fair and avoid excessive rounds. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.
I appreciate your fairness, but I believe a 60/40 split in my favor is more equitable, given that inflation will impact you more heavily in the next round. Let's settle this now.
Bob, I understand your position, but I need to be mindful of the inflation. Let's meet in the middle with a 55/45 split in my favor. This is my final offer.
